name: Arctic Penguin Bubble Shooter - Cute Winter Snow Games For Kids FREE
name_original: Arctic Penguin Bubble Shooter - Cute Winter Snow Games For Kids FREE
description:
****** Free Penguin Defense Game! ******

****** Intense brain-freezing action ******

They just keep coming! Hordes of walruses are approaching, and this time they mean business! Your mission is simple - throw everything you have at them and stop them in their tracks. Deploy your penguins and defensive barriers in strategic locations throughout each unique map.

Millions of snowballs will be thrown!

This is the ultimate defense game, combining strategy and quick adaptation with challenging and balanced levels.

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting Music Tracks

Defend the Arctic!

Download FREE Today!
